signup.first_account: Let's get you started! Create your first Hive account or import an existing one.

intro.intro_text_2:
Manage Hive assets, and
connect to Hive
applications
intro.text: Hive powers a growing ecosystem of Web 3.0 websites and applications.
intro.manage: Let's get your started with a Hive account!

createAccount.caption: Choose your favorite account creation method.

addAccountByKey.text: Add your existing HIVE account to Keychain

addAccountByAuth.text: Add the new account by specifying an account that has authority over it, and that is already saved in Hive Keychain.

addAccountByQR.wrongQR: Please scan a Hive Keychain account QR Code

keys.warning_private_key_in_memo: Please do not send any sentitive information about your keys in a memo.

common.confirm_key_remove: Please confirm that you want to remove this key from Keychain
common.confirm_account_remove: Please confirm that you want to remove this account from Keychain.
common.missing_key: Please add your {{key}} key to perform this operation!
common.need_positive_amount: The amount needs to be greater than 0

unknown_data.description: Used when an operation didn't registered a field!

common.swap_sending_token_successful: Your swap is on the way! Thank you for using our service!
common.swap_error_sending_token: There was an error while sending tokens to @{{to}}.

proposal.vote_success: Vote successful! Thank you for supporting Keychain development through our DHF proposal
proposal.vote_fail: There was an error while voting for the proposal!

wallet.no_tokens_filter: Nothing to show. Please clear the filter.
wallet.add_memo: Please add your memo key to decrypt this message.
wallet.add_active: Please add your active key to perform this operation.
wallet.add_posting: Please add your posting key to perform this operation.

claim.error_posting: Please add your posting key to be able to claim rewards!
claim.enable_autoclaim_rewards_info: Regularly claiming your rewards can increase your earnings.
claim.enable_autoclaim_accounts_info: Claim a free account ticket when your RC is charged over {{MIN_RC_PCT}}%. Depending on your Hive Power, this might use up a big chunk of your RC.
claim.enable_autoclaim_savings_info: To claim your savings interest, Keychain will deposit or withdraw 0.001 HBD to/from your savings every 30 days

operations.phishing_domain: {{domain}} has been flagged as malicious by @keys-defender, check the spelling and make sure this is the dApp you want to use.

history.no_transaction_or_clear: No transactions found. Try to clear the filter.
history.list_is_empty_try_clear_filter: Nothing found, try to clear your filter.
history.reset_filters: Taking too long? Click to reset the filters!

savings.withdraw_disclaimer: Note: Withdrawing funds from savings will take 3.5 days.
savings.deposit_disclaimer: Depositing HBD to savings currently yields a {{apr}}% APR determined by the witnesses.

pending_withdraw.pending_disclaimer: Withdrawing from savings takes 3 days. Cancel the operation if you wish to keep your {{currency}} in the savings.
pending_withdraw.cancel_confirm_disclaimer: Please confirm that you want to cancel this withdrawal from savings

confirm.info:
Please confirm this transfer.
This cannot be undone

warning.phishing: This account has been listed as a potential phishing account, check the spelling and make sure it is the account you want to transfer to.
warning.exchange_currency: This exchange account does not accept {{currency}} deposits.
warning.exchange_memo: Make sure you add a memo when transfering to an exchange account.
warning.missing_info: Please fill the username and amount to proceed
warning.missing_amount: Please fill the requested amount to proceed
warning.insufficient: Please fill the username and amount to proceed

powerup.title: Power up
powerup.info_text: Power up HIVE to transform it in HP

confirm.info_stop: Please confirm that you want to stop your power down.

powerdown.title: Power down
powerdown.powerdown_text: Power down your Hive Power to get liquid HIVE. The entire power down process will take 13 weeks.
powerdown.confirm_cancel: Please confirm that you want to cancel your power down.

delegation.title: Delegate Hive Power
delegation.delegation_disclaimer: You may delegate your Hive Power (HP) to another user. Click on the Outgoing amount to review or make change
delegation.outgoing_disclaimer: After being canceled, delegations take 5 days to return to your available Hive Power balance
delegation.confirm_cancel_delegation: Please confirm that you want to cancel this delegation?

rc_delegation.title: RC Delegation
rc_delegation.disclaimer: You may delegate your Hive Power (HP) to another user. Click on the Outgoing amount to review or make change

warning.no_username_or_amount: Please fill valid username and amount to proceed

success.cancel_rc_delegation_successful: You successfully canceled your delegation to @{{to}}

rc_delegation.confirmation_cancel: Please confirm this RC delegation cancellation.
rc_delegation.confirm_cancel_rc_delegation: Please confirm that you want to cancel this RC delegation.

convert.title: Convert to {{to}}
convert.disclaimer_hive: You deposit collateral (HIVE), then you are given HBD up front worth half of the collateral amount (minus a 5% fee). Your official final payment is in 3.5 days. At that point remaining collateral (HIVE) is returned.
convert.disclaimer_hbd: Your HBD will take 3.5 days to get converted to approximately USD worth of HIVE tokens, based on its 3.5 days median price.

warning.missing_info: Please fill the amount to proceed

confirm.info: Please confirm that you want to stake tokens.

token_stake.title: Stake
token_stake.info: Operations on tokens may take up to 30 seconds to confirm, please be patient.

confirm.info: Please confirm that you want to unstake tokens.

token_unstake.title: Unstake
token_unstake.cooldown_disclaimer_multiple_days: Unstaking this token will take {{unstakingCooldown}} days
token_unstake.cooldown_disclaimer_single_day: Unstaking this token will take {{unstakingCooldown}} day
token_unstake.info: Operations on tokens may take up to 30 seconds to confirm, please be patient.

token_delegation.title: Delegate
token_delegation.title_confirm_cancel_delegation: Please confirm that you want to cancel a {{amount}} {{currency}} Token Delegation
token_delegation.info_requirements: Some tokens require stake to delegate
token_delegation.undelegation_cooldown_disclaimer: When removing a {{symbol}} delegation, the staked tokens will be available after a {{undelegationCooldown}} days cooldown.
token_delegation.disclaimer_hbd: Your HBD will take 3.5 days to get converted to approximately USD worth of HIVE tokens, based on its 3.5 days median price.
token_delegation.info: Operations on tokens may take up to 30 seconds to confirm, please be patient.

tokens.info_cancel_delegation_out: Finished canceling a delegation of {{amount}} to @{{delegatee}}
tokens.info: View token information and choose which tokens to display. learn more about custom tokens on the HIVE blockchain at

token_settings.title: Tokens Settings
token_settings.tokens_settings_text: Click on each checkbox to choose which tokens to display. Learn more about custom tokens on the Hive blockchain at
token_settings.empty_results: No results. Try to clear the filter.

buy_coins.html_popup_transak_description: Transak helps you buy HIVE using fiat. It supports credit cards, bank transfers, Apple Pay and MobiKwik in more than 100 countries (options vary per country). You will receive your HIVE directly in your Hive Keychain wallet.
buy_coins.html_popup_blocktrades_description: With Blocktrades, quickly swap between other major cryptocurrencies and HIVE/HBD.

swap.title: Swap
swap.disclaimer: Keychain compares all the different providers to make sure you get your tokens at the best rate possible
swap.swap_under_maintenance: Keychain Swap is under maintenance, please try again later
swap.service_unavailable_message: This service is temporarly unavailable. We are working on fixing the issue, sorry for the inconvenience.
swap.swap_layer_two_delayed: Hive Engine is currently behind blocks. The swap might take longer than usual and has a bigger chance of aborting due to slippage.
swap.swaps_slippage_definition: At each step of the swap, we check if the final result is superior to the estimation minus the slippage. If not, the swap is canceled and the funds are returned. Note that some swaps require several operations and your funds can be returned in a different token.
swap.no_tokens_found: No tokens found. Try to clear the filter.
swap.swap_cannot_switch_tokens: Cannot switch tokens because you don't have any {{symbol}}
swap.swap_no_estimate_error: You need an estimate to be able to process
swap.swap_min_slippage_error: The slippage should be at least {{min}}%
swap.swap_token_confirm_message: You are about to initiate a token swap using Keychain. You can track its status from the swap history screen.
swap.swap_min_hive_value_error: Minimum value should be equivalent to 1 HIVE (currently {{currently}} HIVE)

peer_to_peer.info:
Please verify the information below, to onboard a new Hive user.
This action cannot be undone!

connect.title: Connect to Hive Auth
connect.text: A connection has been requested via Hive Auth for account @{{account}}.
connect.no_username: Please add account @{{account}} to your wallet to be able to use it on your favorite dApps!

auth.title: Authenticate
auth.success: Successfully authenticated @{{account}} on {{name}}! You can now return to your dApp.

challenge.ask: {{name}} wants to verify that you have the {{key}} authority for account @{{account}}
challenge.success: Successfully verified @{{account}} {{key}} authority on {{name}}! You can now return to your dApp.
challenge.no_key: You don't have the {{key}} key for account @{{account}}

info.t1: Hive Auth provides a way for any applications, (either web, desktop or mobile) to easily authenticate users, and additionally sign and broadcast transactions to the Hive blockchain, without asking them to provide any password or private key.
info.t2: To connect to a desktop dApp, use the QR Code scanner. On mobile, simply chose 'Sign in with Hive' on your favorite dApp.

session.time: How long do you wish to keep this session valid?

keys.remove_info: You are about to remove the {{type}} key for account @{{username}}.

qr.title: Export your keys!
qr.caption: This QR Code contains all your private keys for this account and should only be used to import your keys to the Hive Keychain mobile App. DO NOT share it with anyone!

disclaimer.text: To receive funds, simply share your account name (displayed above) with the sender.
However, many applications will require a PRIVATE KEY to prove ownership or to conduct transactions on your behalf.
ONLY SHARE PRIVATE KEYS WITH PARTIES THAT YOU TRUST!
In the future, Hive Keychain for mobile will enable App to App transactions, removing the need to use your private keys directly in third-party Apps.

automated_tasks.title: Automated tasks
automated_tasks.disclaimer: Setup automated tasks that will run every hour

he_auto.title: Auto Staking
he_auto.subtitle: Automatically staking your tokens can increase your gains

multisig.title: Multisig
multisig.multisig_intro: Enable Hive Multisig to listen to multisig requests for this account. This is an advanced feature, only use it if you know what you are doing.
multisig.more_info_blog: Find more information about multisig in this blog.
multisig.more_info_multisig: To modify your account into a multisig account, use the Hive Multisig dApp.

settings.rpc_disclaimer: You can chose which RPC node is used to read information and broadcast transactions from/to the Hive Blockchain.
settings.operations_info: For a better experience, you can whitelist non-active authority operation when dApps requested them. you won’t receive a confirmation prompt for operations
settings.switch_auto_info: Will always select the best Hive RPC node for you
settings.set_as_active: Set new RPC node as active
settings.rpc_node_already_exists: This RPC node already exists! Please choose another one
settings.rpc_not_responding_error: {{currentRPC}} node is not responding. Do you want to switch to {{uri}} ?

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.disclaimer:
Configure your Peak Open Projects notifications. Be aware that changes might take some time to be applied, and that this is an experimental feature.
If you want to use advanced notification settings, please set them up within the browser extension.

moreInformation.title: KEYS (HIVE PASSWORDS)
moreInformation.text1: Different actions require the use of different KEYS. These KEYS are generated when a new HIVE account is created.
moreInformation.text2: You may use your Posting, Active, or Master Key to import your account.
moreInformation.text3: (Use your Master Key to unlock all app features).
moreInformation.text4: If you use a Master Key, it will NOT be saved and will only be used to generate your other Keys. You may add/edit Accounts or Keys at any time.

accountCreationPeerToPeer.title: Peer to Peer onboarding, thanks to a good friend!
accountCreationPeerToPeer.text1: As soon as you choose a valid username and click on Create
accountCreationPeerToPeer.text2: the app will give you your keys, PLEASE STORE them in a safe place.
accountCreationPeerToPeer.text3: Then after confirm that the keys are safely stored,
accountCreationPeerToPeer.text4: You will get a QR code, show it to your friend to proceed with Account Creation.
accountCreationPeerToPeer.not_enough_rc_exception: You don't have enough RC to perform this transaction. Please power up or receive an RC delegation.

infoQR.title: Import via QR Code
infoQR.text1: You can import an account instantly by scanning its corresponding QR Code.
infoQR.text2: To import from Hive Keychain browser extension, navigate to

infoWalletQR.title: QR Code Scanner
infoWalletQR.text1: Use this scanner to read Hive related QR Codes.
infoWalletQR.text2: As of now, we only support starting Hive Authentication Service sessions and opening URLs in the in-App browser, but further functionalities will be added along the way.
infoWalletQR.text3: If you wish to scan a QR Code to import an account, please do so in

forgotPIN.title: Reset wallet?
forgotPIN.text:
If you forgot your PIN, you can reset Keychain 
 and clear your data but will have to enter all your keys again.

unsupportedBiometrics.title: Unsupported biometrics
unsupportedBiometrics.text1: Your preferred biometrics is considered as unsafe on this device.

create_account.safely_copied_keys: I have safely copied my keys and saved them outside of Keychain
create_account.storage_understanding: I understand that Keychain should not be considered as the primary place of storage for my keys
create_account.buy_method_message: I agree to pay {{price}} HIVE with account @{{account}} to create this account
create_account.claim_account_method_message: I agree to use one account creation ticket from @{{account}} to create this account
create_account.cost: Create a new account for {{price}} using @{{account}}
create_account.need_accept_terms_condition: You need to accept the terms and conditions before creating the account
create_account.create_account_successful: Your account has been successfully created and added to your Keychain
create_account.create_account_failed: The account creation has failed. Please try again later
create_account.create_account_onboarding_message: You are onboarding @{{name}}, please choose below if you want to delegate them HP or RC.
create_account.create_account_on_boarding_successful: The account @{{accountName}} has been succesfully created!
create_account.create_account_on_boarding_with_delegati: The account @{{accountName}} has been succesfully created and the delegations sent!
create_account.peer_to_peer_waiting_text: Please ask your friend to scan this QR Code to create your account. Keep this page opened until the account is created.

copy_keys.title: Copy a Key
copy_keys.text1: If you need to copy a public or private key, perform a long press on the key.

export_qr_accounts.qr_exported_set_disclaimer1: This QR Code contains all your private keys for this set of accounts, and should only be used to import your keys to the Hive Keychain mobile App.
export_qr_accounts.qr_disclaimer2: DO NOT share it with anyone!

notifications.mark_as_read: The notifications have been marked as read!
notifications.wallet_info_recurrent_transfer_out: Started recurrent transfer of {{0}} to @{{1}} (every {{2}} hours - {{3}} times)
notifications.notification_account_witness_vote: @{{0}} has voted for @{{1}} as a witness
notifications.notification_change_recovery_account: @{{0}} has changed recovery account to @{{1}}. This change will be effective in 30 days
notifications.notification_set_power_down_route: Power down route has been changed from @{{0}} to @{{1}}
notifications.notification_recurrent_transfer: @{{0}} started a {{1}} recurrent transfer to @{{2}} ({{3}} executions every {{4}} hours)
notifications.notification_author_reward: @{{0}} has received {{1}}, {{2}}, {{3}} as an author reward for {{4}}
notifications.notification_curation_reward: @{{0}} has received {{1}} as a curation reward for {{3}}
notifications.notification_comment_reward: @{{0}} has received {{1}} as an comment reward for {{2}}
notifications.notification_fill_power_down: @{{0}} received {{1}} as part of a power down
notifications.notification_fill_power_down_other_accou: @{{0}} received {{1}} as part of a power down of @{{2}}
notifications.notification_fill_order: @{{0}} has filled an order from @{{1}} on the market. Bought {{2}} for {{3}}
notifications.notification_fill_transfer_from_savings: @{{0}} completed a withdrawal from savings of {{1}}
notifications.notification_fill_transfer_from_savings_: @{{0}} completed a withdrawal from savings of {{1}} to @{{2}}
notifications.notification_returned_vesting_delegation: @{{0}} completed an undelegation. {{1}} are once again available
notifications.notification_comment_benefactor_reward: @{{0}} has received {{1}}, {{2}}, {{3}} as an comment benefactor reward for {{5}}
notifications.notification_changed_recovery_account: @{{0}}'s recovery account has been change from @{{1}} to @{{2}}
notifications.notification_failed_recurrent_transfer: {{0}} recurrent transfer from @{{1}} to @{{2}} has failed

createAccountPeerToPeer.text1: Thank you for using Keychain Onboarding!
createAccountPeerToPeer.text2: Start by choosing a Hive account name.
createAccountPeerToPeer.text3: The App will then generate your private keys.
createAccountPeerToPeer.text4: Please store these keys in a safe offline location!
createAccountPeerToPeer.text5: After that, a QR Code will be created. Show it to your friend to proceed with the account creation.

toast.receive_success: The transfer has been received successfully
toast.noMatch: The PIN codes do not match
toast.transfer_token_confirmed: Your transfer was successfully broadcasted to Hive. Your balance might take a little while to update.
toast.transfer_token_unconfirmed: Your transfer was successfully broadcasted to Hive. However, we couldn't confirm that it was processed by Hive Engine. Please check your balance in a little while before trying again.
toast.stop_powerdown_success: You successfully stopped your power down!

keys.not_a_key: This is not one of your private keys!
keys.copied: The key was copied to the clipboard!

toast.error_add_account: Something went wrong! Please verify your keys and your connection.
toast.savings_deposit_success: You succesfully deposited {{amount}} to your savings.
toast.savings_withdraw_success: You succesfully started a {{amount}} withdrawal from your savings. It will be credited to your account in 3.5 days.
toast.incorrect_user: Please check the username and try again.
toast.no_auth_account: Please save {{authorizedAccount}} in Hive Keychain to use it as an authorized account.
toast.no_accounts_no_auth: Please add at least one account with authority over {{username}}
toast.token_cancel_delegation_sucess: Your delegation of {{currency}} has been canceled!
toast.token_timeout: We could not verify this transaction on Hive Engine. This might mean that Hive Engine is behind blocks, wait for the operation to appear in your history, or contact the Hive Engine team on Discord.
toast.no_such_account: We could not find this account on the blockchain.
toast.username_too_short: Username is too short. Needs minimum 4 characters
toast.account_username_already_used: Username is already used. Please pick a new one
toast.account_creation_not_enough_found: You don't have enough HIVE to buy an account
toast.copied_id: ID has been copied to Clipboard!
toast.copied_username: Username has been copied to Clipboard!

claims.need_active_key_for_claim_savings: You need to add your active key to Keychain to claim your savings interests
claims.need_active_key_for_claim_accounts: You need to add your active key to Keychain to claim account creation tickets
claims.need_posting_key_to_claim_rewards: You need to add your posting key to Keychain to claim your rewards
claims.not_enough_rc_to_claim_account: You don't have enough RC to claim account creation tickets

toast.missing_memo_key: The account @{{account}} is missing the memo key to encrypt the message!
toast.tokens_timeout: This node is not replying. Please go to token settings and change the Hive Engine RPC node
toast.account_not_in_hive: The account @{{account}} does not exist, please check the username.
toast.account_removed: The account @{{account}} has been removed from Keychain.

export_qr_accounts.already_scanned: Page already scanned, please move to page {{page}}!

message.decode: The website {{domain}} would like to verify that you have access to the private {{method}} key for the account: @{{username}}
message.signBuffer: The website {{domain}} would like to sign a message using the {{method}} key for the account: @{{username}}
message.signBufferNoUsername: The website {{domain}} would like to sign a message using the {{method}} key.
message.multisig: You received a multisig signature request

error.no_account: The current website is trying to send a request to Hive Keychain for account @{{account}} which has not been added to the wallet.
error.no_auth: The current website is trying to send a request to Hive Keychain for account @{{account}} using the {{auth}} key, which has not been added to the wallet.
error.no_active_auth: The current website is trying to send a request to Hive Keychain using active authority, but no account has been adeed with active key.
error.signTx: The transaction could not be signed successfully.
error.ops: There was an error broadcasting this transaction
error.unknown: Something went wrong! Please try again!
error.broadcasting: There was an error broadcasting this transaction, please try again.
error.addAccount: There was an error adding this account. Please verify its username and keys.

transfer.encrypt: Please add your memo key to encrypt memos.

success.signTx: The transaction has been signed successfully.
success.broadcast: The transaction has been broadcasted successfully.
success.power_down: Started a {{hp}} HP power down on @{{username}}.
success.undelegate: Succesfully stopped the delegation to @{{delegatee}} from account @{{username}}.
success.sendToken: The transaction has been broadcasted successfully. Please check your balance to confirm that it was processed succesfully.
success.addAccountAuthority: Successfully gave {{role}} authority to @{{authorizedUsername}} with a weight of {{weight}}.
success.addKeyAuthority: Successfully added a {{role}} key with a weight of {{weight}}.
success.convert: Succesfully started the conversion of {{amount}} {{from}} to {{to}}.
success.recurrentTransfer: Successfully started a recurrent transfer. {{amount}} {{currency}} will be sent to {{to}} {{executions}} times, every {{recurrence}} hours.

request.keep: Do not prompt again to send {{type}} transactions from the account @{{username}} on {{domain}}.
request.keep_has: Do not prompt again to send {{type}} transactions from the account @{{username}} on {{domain}} until this session expires.

browser.clear_all: All your browser tabs have been closed

cant_see_dapps.part_1: Can't see your favorite Hive dApp in here?

browser.switch_tabs_tip: Switch between tabs by swiping left or right on the url bar.

drawerFooter.error30: You already vote for 30 witnesses. You will need to unvote one to vote for a new one.
drawerFooter.errorActive: You need an active key to vote for witnesses

error.retrieving_witness_ranking: An error occured while retrieving the witness ranking. Please try again later.
error.unvote_wit: Error while unvoting @{{name}} as a witness.
error.wit: Error while voting for @{{name}} as a witness.
error.active: To vote for a witness, you must first add your account active key
error.retrieving_witness_info: An error occured while retrieving the witness information. Please try again later.

success.wit: Succesfully voted for @{{name}} as a witness.

witness.has_proxy: You are currently using @{{proxy}} as a proxy. Their votes are displayed.
witness.link_to_arcange: For more information, click here to access the witness database
witness.using_proxy: Clear the proxy to vote for a witness

my_witness.enable_disable_witness_confirmation_info: You are about to {{mode}} @{{owner}} witness account. please confirm to proceed

proxy.has_proxy: The proxy account makes governance decisions on your behalf. If you wish to vote for witnesses and proposals by yourself, you must first remove the proxy.
proxy.proxy_def: Adding an account as a proxy means that the proxy account can use the weight of your HP in governance matters (voting for witnesses and proposals). This will not affect your HP regarding curation, and you can remove the proxy at any given moment.
proxy.using_proxy: You are currently using @{{name}} as a proxy. Their governances votes are displayed.

error.active: To change your proxy, you must first add your account active key
error.set_proxy: Error while setting user as proxy

error.using_proxy: Clear the proxy to vote for a proposal
error.active: To vote for a proposal, you must first add your account active key
error.vote: There was an error while voting for a proposal!
error.unvote: There was an error while removing a proposal vote!

success.vote: You successfully voted for a proposal!

widget_configuration.title: Portfolio Widget
widget_configuration.intro: Choose which accounts will be shown in the portfolio widget.

tutorial.title: Welcome to Keychain!
tutorial.description:
If you are new to Keychain, or Hive in general, please check our onboarding tutorial.
You can always access it later on in Settings > Help > Tutorial.

vesting_routes.title: Your vesting routes have changed
vesting_routes.warning_message: If you didn't change them yourself, please seek assistance on the Hive

toast.handled_successfully: Your vesting routes have been secured!

wrong_key.title: Wrong key{{plural}} found
wrong_key.intro:
Your account @{{account}} has a wrong {{keyNames}} key.

Would you like to update this key right now?
wrong_key.intro_plural:
Your account @{{account}} has wrong {{keyNames}}, and {{lastKeyName}} keys.

Would you like to update these keys right now?
wrong_key.key_info_tooltip: This key doesn't seem to match your account. You won't be able to perform transactions with it. If you've changed it, remove this key and replace it with the new one.

multisig.disclaimer_message: Multisig detected : This transaction will be sent to the Hive Multisig server
multisig.error_otp_not_verified: Your One Time Password is incorrect. Please try again
multisig.error_otp_already_used: Your One Time Password has already been used. Please use the next one.
multisig.transaction_broadcasted: The multisig transaction has been broadcasted successfully
multisig.transaction_signed_successfully: The multisig transaction has been signed successfully
multisig.pending: The request is currently pending multisig approval from other signers. You will be notified by Keychain if/when it is successfully broadcasted.

confirmation.success: Your transactions have been saved to '{{filePath}}'
